data.name: 0_title_tab
data.value: Specializations | Grzegorz Bochnacki - Legal Counsel Office

data.name: 1_title_rectangle
data.value: Specializations

data.name: 2.1.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Agreements and contracts

data.name: 2.1.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
• preparing concepts and structure of agreements as well as specimens and draft agreements, contracts, civil and business settlements,
  • drafting agreements and settlements concerning business activity (e.g. sale, delivery, exchange), different types of framework agreements, agreements concerning use of objects as well as loan agreements,
  • drafting agreements for persons, who do not conduct business activity,
  • drafting preliminary and conditional agreements,
  • preparing general provisions of the agreements, different types of regulations and internal rules,
  • preparing legal opinions concerning civil and commercial agreements,
  • legal analysis and assessments of agreements, settlements and drafts thereto,
  • individual or team negotiations of agreements and settlements,
  • supervising the execution of contractual as well as civil and business settlements liabilities.

data.name: 2.2.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Corporate services

data.name: 2.2.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
• legal aid by establishing companies, foundations, associations and others,
  • drafting internal documents, applications and forms necessary to conduct business activity by natural and legal persons,
  • legal services for companies’ bodies (meeting of partners/shareholders and supervisory boards as well as management boards),
  • legal aid by termination and liquidation of business entities,
  • legal services by liquidation and bankruptcy proceedings of legal entities,
  • legal services by personal bankruptcies,
  • legal services by capital and organizational transformations of companies, merger proceedings as well as division of commercial companies,
  • legal counsel by transformation of sole proprietorship into corporations and partnerships,
  • development of optimal tax solutions with reference to corporate changes,
  • legal representation by registration and disclosure of changes in the conducted business activities of the entities before courts, administrative bodies and offices, conducted in any form.

data.name: 2.3.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Intellectual property

data.name: 2.3.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
Preparing legal opinions concerning intellectual property as well as drafting, verifiying and negotiating:

  • agreement on the assignment of economic copyrights,
  • agreement on use of works (license agreements),
  • agreement on transfer of right to register trademark and right to application,
  • agreements on use of trademark (license agreements),
  • agreements with artists and performers for participation in feature film ma king, publishing agreements and coo productions of feature films,
  • agreement concerning creating software (modification of software) and transfer of copyrights,
  • agreements concerning IT systems, including license and implementation agreements,
  • preparing applications for registration of trademarks, utility models and patents,
  • representation by patent agents in registration proceedings before Patent Office in country and abroad,
  • development of strategies and procedures concerning protection of intellectual property.

data.name: 2.4.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Transformations, mergers and takeovers

data.name: 2.4.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
• legal counselling in the process of transformation of entities conducting business activity registered in the register of business activity into partnerships and corporations,
  • legal counselling in the process of fusion and division of corporations,
  • legal counselling in the scope of privatization and reorganization of entrepreneurs and state-owned companies,
  • legal research (legal analyses) aiming at assessment of business entity’s legal situation conducted for the purposes of reorganization, privatization or execution of investment projects,
  • legal counselling in the process of transferring share ownership/shares, legal assessment of transaction, preparing reports as well as supervision of capital transaction executions,
  • companies’ divisions, mergers and takeovers,
  • legal counselling concerning preparation and execution of settlements between shareholders/stockholders, participation and representation in negotiations between investors.

data.name: 2.5.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Properties

data.name: 2.5.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
• analysis property's legal status,
  • drafting agreements and participation in negotiations concerning purchase of property for the indicated purposes,
  • establishment of property easement, pre-trial negotiations and court disputes in this respect,
  • legal counselling concerning conclusion of lease and tenancy agreements for housing or investment purposes,
  • legal counselling concerning use of property in the course of business activity,
  • legal services by proceedings concerning permit for acquisition of property by foreign investors, development conditions and building permits before competent authorities,
  • legal aid by choosing appropriate form of purchase or security of property,
  • legal counselling concerning transformation of perpetual usufruct of property into right of ownership and cooperative ownership right to premises into separate ownership,
  • legal services for property managers and administrators.

data.name: 2.6.1_leftside_container_card_header
data.value: Administration

data.name: 2.6.2_leftside_container_card_content
data.value:
• legal services concerning particular proceedings in the scope of administrative law (including administrative procedure),
  • legal aid concerning preparation of applications, request and letters in administrative cases and proceedings,
  • legal aid concerning required applications and notices,
  • representing clients before offices, national administrative bodies, including appeal proceedings at every stage of proceedings,
  • legal aid concerning acceptance of required administrative permissions and notices, obtaining administrative decisions,
  • court representations before administrative courts at each level of jurisdiction.

data.name: 3.1.1_rightside_container_card_header
data.value: Taxes

data.name: 3.1.2_rightside_container_card_content
data.value:
Together witch our tax attorneys:

  • we prepare tax opinions and analyses,
  • offer legal aid during tax and fiscal audit,
  • advise on applications for individual tax interpretations,
  • offer legal representation in tax appeal proceedings and court proceedings,
  • draft letters in tax, securing and executive cases conducted before offices, fiscal and customs chambers,
  • drafting appeals, claims and complaints against decisions and orders of tax authorities,
  • offer legal representation in administrative and court proceedings before regional administrative court (WSA) to supreme administrative court (NSA).

data.name: 3.2.1_rightside_container_card_header
data.value: Labour law and social insurance law

data.name: 3.2.2_rightside_container_card_content
data.value:
• we prepare and analyze specimens of documents and regulations as well as binding for employees in workplaces operating procedures,
  • we draft and give opinions on work regulations, remuneration regulations and collective bargaining agreements,
  • we offer legal aid concerning proceedings in cases of infringement of employees rights conducted before labour inspectorate,
  • we represent employees and employers in proceedings in labour law cases before common courts,
  • owe advise in processes of reorganization of employment, including implementation of individual and collective redundancies proceedings,
  • we support contacts with company’s trade union organizations and company’s social labour inspectorates,
  • we prepare legal opinions and analyses concerning labour law,
  • we provide legal counselling concerning accidents at work and occupational diseases,
  • we provide legal counselling concerning legal remedies used by labour inspectorates and procedures of their challenging,
  • we offer trainings for management in the scope of labour law provisions.

data.name: 3.3.1_rightside_container_card_header
data.value: Bankruptcy and composition law

data.name: 3.3.2_rightside_container_card_content
data.value:
• drafting arrangements and liquidation bankruptcy petitions,
  • preparing and managing personal bankruptcy,
  • participation in bankruptcy and composition proceedings in accordance with new bankruptcy law,
  • drafting court papers for bankruptcy and composition proceedings,
  • negotiating and concluding settlements before common courts.

data.name: 3.4.1_rightside_container_card_header
data.value: Court disputes, execution

data.name: 3.4.2_rightside_container_card_content
data.value:
• representing clients before common courts at every stage of jurisdiction,
  • conducting securing proceedings,
  • drafting court papers in civil, criminal and administrative proceedings,
  • negotiating and concluding settlements before common courts,
  • conducting enforcement proceedings for debtor and creditor,
  • conducting proceedings to prevent enforcement, challenging decisions of court enforcement officer and other legal remedies for debtor against creditor,
  • legal aid in debt recovery before initiation of court proceedings,
  • securing receivables and obligations.
